metadata.title: CVE-2022-35015 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Advancecomp v2.3 was discovered to contain a heap buffer overflow viale_uint32_read at /lib/endianrw.h.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-35015` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

advancecomp - 2.1-2.1ubuntu0.20.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: advancecomp package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1-2.1ubuntu0.20.04.1').
